page.title: 17My August walk to the stream
page.content: On Saturday we went for a walk down the stream. On the way we went past Mrs.Inchley's house and down the road through the woods. That was very wet and muddy and there were lots of leaves on the road. Mummy and Cherry took us children. Jamie, Gemma, James, Tom and me kept on splashing in the mud puddles. We walked through the wood and on past a row of small cottages. On the right there were farmers' fields. We went along the public footpath and through the fields down to the footbridge and I saw a heron. Then we walked over the bridge and along the other side of the stream until we found a place where we could get down into the water. I went down the bank and got stung all down the back of my legs and then the others came down but did not get stung.
